episodes.synopsis: When seven abducted strangers wake up in a deserted town, they discover that whoever took them has installed extreme measures to keep them prisoner.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The abducted struggle to make sense of their situation (and one another) as they plot several escape attempts -- none of which go exactly as planned.
episodes.title: The Edge

episodes.synopsis: After a week of failed escape attempts, the hostages hope that a helicopter signals rescue, but it only hovers long enough to drop a mysterious box.
episodes.title: The Way Through

episodes.synopsis: Tension mounts when the night manager informs the group that someone will be "checking out," and then a taxi arrives with instructions to take Janet.
episodes.title: Exit One

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Tori is missing, the group's search for her turns up a mysterious, violent newcomer with the name "Erika" tattooed on her arm.
episodes.title: Incoming

episodes.synopsis: When Joe falls ill, the group becomes alarmed. Meanwhile, Erika discovers an antidote, but refuses to give it to Joe unless he reveals his secret.
episodes.title: The Truth

episodes.synopsis: When Joe confesses everything he knows about the kidnappers and their organization, he puts himself in a vulnerable position with all involved.
episodes.title: Smoke and Steel

episodes.synopsis: After Joe is told he must be "reeducated" to return to the program or he will die, he is forced to endure a dizzying array of dreams and flashbacks.
episodes.title: Saved

episodes.synopsis: After returning to town, Joe suffers from side effects caused by his "reeducation," and the others wonder if they would be better off without him.
episodes.title: Static

episodes.synopsis: The level of uneasiness among the "guests" heightens when they find very personal items in their rooms that remind them of their pasts.
episodes.title: Identity

episodes.synopsis: The battle for Janet's affections intensifies as she sets her sights on the new night manager, Ulrich, as her ticket out of town.
episodes.title: Seven Sacrifices

episodes.synopsis: When the group goes searching for Janet and Ulrich, they discover all their supplies have disappeared and that they are left on their own to survive.
episodes.title: And Then There Was One

episodes.synopsis: After surviving an unexpected van crash, the abductees finally escape, but "The Program" has no intention of letting them return to their real lives.
episodes.title: Shadows in the Cave

video.title: Persons Unknown
video.synopsis: Seven strangers disappear without a trace and wake up together in a hotel room.  The suspense is in finding out why they were taken -- and by whom.
